content: mini moon square materials yarn in two colours yarn a background and yarn b moon a hook size to suit your yarn abbreviations magic_ring = magic_ring chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet us double_crochet uk half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet us half treble_crochet uk double_crochet = double_crochet us treble_crochet uk slip_stitch = slip_stitch fo = fasten_off # = number of stitches in row behookedwitch wordpress com 1 notes the moon row are made in a continuous spiral don t join the rounds unless instructed and don t turn the work i used a seamless fasten_off http //www mooglyblog com/crochet-video-tutorial-seamless- finishing-when-working-in-the-round/ i ve found this makes the bottom part of the moon more pointy but it should still look moon-like without it i used standing half double and standing double_crochet stitches to join in the new colours they may be tricky stitches to wrap your fingers around but i love the results there are tutorials here http //www mooglyblog com/standing-double-crochet-joining/ and http //www mooglyblog com/standing-half-double-crochet/ pattern round 1 with yarn a make a magic_ring and ch2 does not count as a stitch 12 half_double_crochet in magic_ring pull the magic_ring closed don t join the round don t turn the work 12 round 2 single_crochet into first stitch after you ve made it mark this first single_crochet because you ll be using it later in yarn b single_crochet in next stitch fo yarn a behookedwitch wordpress com 2 2 half_double_crochet in next stitch half_double_crochet and 2 double_crochet in next stitch 3 double_crochet in next stitch 2 double_crochet and half_double_crochet in next stitch 2 half_double_crochet in next stitch single_crochet in next stitch slip_stitch in next stitch fo yarn b 15 moon-shape stitches round 3 join yarn a to the stitch with the marker in it you can either do this by using a standing double_crochet stitch or join the yarn and ch3 double_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet in the same stitch you joined to double_crochet in next stitch half_double_crochet in next 3 stitches 2 double_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet in next stitch double_crochet in next stitch half_double_crochet in next 3 stitches 3 times slip_stitch to start of round to join fo yarn a 32 double_crochet 4 chain spaces behookedwitch wordpress com 3 tip if you did a clean fasten_off for the yellow yarn in round two don t crochet into in instead crochet into the small bit of leftover blue stitch at the side of it this will help you keep the moon shape sharper round 4 join yarn b to any corner ch2 space of round 3 you can either do this by using a standing half_double_crochet stitch or join the yarn and ch2 half_double_crochet ch2 2
